en.content: You turn your face away, and when she tries again, you dash the cup from her hands using the side of your head. The clear liquid spills across the floor.
The woman gives a half-shrug and turns to leave the room. You shout after her, but she gives no reaction.

zh.content: 你扭过脸去，当她再次尝试的时候，你用头去撞她的手，把杯子打翻在地。清澈的液体洒在地面上。
老妪轻轻耸耸肩，转身离开了房间。你在她身后呐喊，但她无动于衷。
